title: Large-Scale Solar UV Radiation and Health: Practice-Centered Online Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic biology and environmental science concepts, and ability to interpret UV index
context.additional_context: Strengthening scientific data analysis and health literacy education through integration with language subjects.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more biological effects of solar UV radiation using scientific terminology.
Learners can calculate safe UV exposure standards with 80% accuracy by analyzing practical data.
Learners can present two or more context-specific UV protection strategies applicable to daily life.

resources: Simulation Tools within Learning Management Systems (LMS)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
